description.value:
You wreath yourself in molten stone and hurtle toward your enemy. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap] up to your Speed. At the end of your Leap, a wave of lava crashes onto all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level -4)/3)+1)d6[bludgeoning], (floor((@actor.level -4)/3)+2)d6[fire]|traits:area-damage] damage, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.kineticist.dc)|basic:true] save against your class DC.

The cooling remains of the lava form a temporary protective shell around you, granting you a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Level (+3) Each type of damage increases by 1d6.
